general.versionDoesNotExist: Se pare că versiunea modulului nu poate fi recuperată. Este din partea noastră, vă rugăm să încercați din nou.
general.moduleNeedActivation: Marketing with Google este dezactivat, nu veți putea utiliza niciuna dintre caracteristicile sale până când nu activați modulul.

moduleUpdateNeeded.ps_eventbus:
Versiunea modulului PrestaShop CloudSync care rulează pe acest magazin este mai veche decât cea minimă necesară.

Puteți utiliza PrestaShop Marketing with Google, dar unele caracteristici (de exemplu, sincronizarea produselor) nu vor fi disponibile până când nu veți actualiza PrestaShop CloudSync.
moduleUpdateNeeded.psxmarketingwithgoogle: Vă rugăm să actualizați modulul PrestaShop Marketing With Google pentru a-l face să funcționeze corect

general.adblockerActivated: Te rugăm să dezactivezi ad-blocker-ul pentru ca modulul să funcționeze corect și să reîmprospătezi navigatorul.
general.unableToFetchData: Nu am reușit să preluăm datele, te rugăm să încerci din nou mai târziu
general.createNewAccount: Dacă nu ai un cont, poți {0} astăzi.

header.title: Marketing with Google
header.text: Cu Prestashop Marketing, poți ajunge la potențialii cumpărători care caută online produse precum cele pe care le oferi! Folosiți acest modul pentru a ajunge la ei cu Google în 3 pași simpli.

content1.title: Sincronizează catalogul de produse cu Google
content1.text: Conecteaza-ti magazinul la Google Merchant Center si sincronizeaza intregul catalog de produse in cateva clicuri. Atributele produsului, cum ar fi prețul și disponibilitatea vor fi actualizate automat în fiecare zi.

content2.title: Activează listările gratuite pentru produsele tale
content2.text:
Listările gratuite permit afișarea atributelor tale de produs, inclusiv a imaginii și a prețului în listările clasificate în mod organic în fila de cumpărături.  
 
 Odată ce catalogul a fost sincronizat, activează listările gratuite pe tabloul de bord și începe să afișezi produsele în fila de cumpărături gratuit.
content2.footer:
Creați un nou cont [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"] sau conectați unul existent.  
Pentru a vă afișa produsele pe Google, va trebui să îndepliniți [eligibility requirements]({1})[:target="_blank"]

content3.title: Stimulează-ți creșterea numărului de clienți și a vânzărilor cu Performance Max
content3.text: Vrei să maximizezi performanțele campaniei tale și să găsești clienții potriviți oriunde ar fi? Dintr-o singură campanie, Performance Max colectează date pentru diferite canale Google, și optimizează performanța campaniei dvs. arătând unde reclamele dvs. au șanse mai mari de a conduce conversia.

footer.text: Obține produsele tale găsite pe Google cu PS Marketing cu Google
footer.explanation: În Spațiul Economic European, Regatul Unit sau Elveția, campaniile Performance Max pot fi utilizate cu orice serviciu de comparare a cumpărăturilor (CSS) cu care lucrezi. Anunțurile vor fi afișate pe paginile de rezultate generale de căutare și pe orice alte suprafețe pentru care CSS a optat.

sectionTitle.psAccount: Asociază magazinul tău la contul PrestaShop

freeListing.title: Atinge mai multe persoane pe Google cu listări gratuite
freeListing.subtitle: Listările gratuite îți oferă acces la milioane de cumpărători care caută produse similare cu ale tale. Afișează produsele tale gratuite în listele clasate organic pe fila de cumpărături atunci când conectezi contul Google la Google Merchant Center.
freeListing.lastTitle: Companiile care au folosit anunțuri gratuite și anunțuri în fila Shopping au înregistrat o creștere medie de peste 50% a numărului de clicuri și de peste 100% a numărului de impresii. (Date interne Google, iulie 2020)

smartShoppingCampaign.title: Publicitate pe Google cu Performance Max
smartShoppingCampaign.subtitle:
Conectează-te sau creează-ți contul Google Ads și lansează o campanie Performance Max pentru produsele tale. Maximizează performanța campaniei tale prin mai multe canale Google printr-o singură campanie. Arată reclamele tale acolo unde au șanse mai mari de a conduce conversia.

 Și mai bine, nu plătești dacă clienții nu dau click.

onboarding.productFeedNotice: Ajută clienții să găsească mai ușor produsele tale pe Google și listează-le gratuit cu listări gratuite. Listările gratuite ajută la accesarea mai multor clienți și îi fac să viziteze site-ul dvs.

multiShopSelector.title: Modul multimagazin activat
multiShopSelector.subtitle: Trebuie să configurezi magazinele unul câte unul pentru acest serviciu, dar vei putea utiliza același cont.
multiShopSelector.selectStore: Te rugăm să selectezi primul magazin de configurat din lista de mai jos
multiShopSelector.tips: După ce ai terminat cu primul magazin, le poți configura pe celelalte, selectându-le unul câte unul din selectorul magazinului, în meniul orizontal

googleAccountCard.title: Cont Google
googleAccountCard.introDisabled: Conectează-ți contul Google și asociază-l cu Google Merchant Center pentru a debloca listările gratuite.
googleAccountCard.introEnabled: Accesul prin modulul PrestaShop asociat cu contul de e-mail Google Merchant Center și conturile Google Ads.
googleAccountCard.footerDissociating: PrestaShop utilizează acest cont pentru a gestiona și sincroniza conturile Merchant Center și Google Ads.
googleAccountCard.alertCantConnect: Nu te poți conecta la contul tău Google acum. Încearcă din nou mai târziu.
googleAccountCard.alertTokenMissing: Nu am reușit să autentificăm contul. Încearcă din nou sau treci la un alt cont.
googleAccountCard.alertInfo:
Asigură-te că acorzi toate permisiunile solicitate atunci când autentifici contul Google.  
Această acțiune este obligatorie pentru ca acest serviciu să funcționeze corect.
googleAccountCard.missingTokenScopes:
Unele permisiuni solicitate lipsesc.  
Toate permisiunile solicitate sunt obligatorii pentru ca acest serviciu să funcționeze corect, te rugăm să gestionezi contul și să te asiguri că le permiți pe toate.

mcaCard.title: Contul Merchant Center
mcaCard.introDisabled: Poți conecta un cont Google Merchant Center existent sau poți crea unul nou în câțiva pași simpli.
mcaCard.claimCollides: Site-ul tău a fost deja revendicat.
mcaCard.claimOverwrite: Pentru a finaliza crearea contului Merchant Center, trebuie să suprascrii cererea existentă.
mcaCard.footerEU: Pentru magazinele din Spațiul Economic European, Regatul Unit sau Elveția, contul tău Merchant Center trebuie să fie asociat cu un [Comparison Shopping Service (CSS)]({0})[:target="_blank"]]. Pentru noile conturi Merchant Center create prin intermediul acestei aplicații, contul tău va fi asociat în mod implicit cu Google Shopping, CSS al Google. Poți schimba în orice moment CSS-ul asociat contului și poți găsi, de asemenea, partenerii CSS aici. După ce ai configurat contul Merchant Center, poți utiliza instrumentul nostru de integrare, indiferent de CSS-ul pe care îl utilizezi.
mcaCard.shopInfoMissingDescription: Pentru a completa informațiile lipsă ale magazinului, te rugăm să accesezi [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"]].
mcaCard.userIsNotAdmin: Ai nevoie de acces de la administrator
mcaCard.userIsTestAccount: Acesta este un cont de test
mcaCard.shopMaintenance:
Nu poți conecta un cont Google Merchant Center în timp ce modul de întreținere este activ.  
Te rugăm să modifici parametrii magazinului.
mcaCard.linkingFailed: Nu te poți conecta la contul tău Merchant Center acum. Încearcă din nou mai târziu.
mcaCard.unlinkFailed: Eroare neașteptată. Reîncarcă pagina și încearcă din nou.
mcaCard.tryAgainLater: Nu putem verifica sau revendica site-ul actual. **Recomandăm să te asiguri că site-ul este accesibil** și să încerci din nou mai târziu.
mcaCard.alertSuspendedDescription: Pentru a vedea mai multe detalii despre motivele suspendării, te rugăm să vizitezi [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"]]. Odată rezolvată, va trebui să soliciți o nouă revizuire prin completarea [this form]({1})[:target="_blank"].
mcaCard.overwriteToBeDoneManually: Site-ul tău a fost deja revendicat pe un alt cont de merchant center. Deoarece nu suntem administratorul contului tău., nu putem suprascrie această cerere pentru tine. Te rugăm să mergi la [Google Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"] , și schimbă URL-ul site-ului web cu acesta : {1}
mcaCard.ineligibleForFreeListing: Contul dvs. nu este eligibil pentru listări îmbunătățite gratuite pe Google
mcaCard.ineligibleForFreeListingDescription: Vă rugăm să examinați dezaprobările la nivel de produs, precum și la contul general.
mcaCard.claimOverwriteWithManualAction: To finalize your Google Merchant Center account connection, you need to provide your website URL ({0}) in your Google Merchant Center account.
mcaCard.newGmcNotListed: Waiting for your account to be published
mcaCard.newGmcNotListedDescription: If you just created a new account, it means Google is still building it. You have to wait or come back later. This operation can take up to 5 minutes on Google side. In other cases, check that your GMC is still existing, and that you still have rights on it.
mcaCard.phoneVerificationNeededDescription: To be able to use your Merchant Center account you have to verify your phone number
mcaCard.phoneVerifiedContinue: Your phone number has been verified, you can continue your account creation.
mcaCard.textMessageHasBeenSent: A text message containing an X-digit code has been sent
mcaCard.askAgain60sec: You will be able to ask for a new code in 60 seconds
mcaCard.needPhoneVerification: We need to verify your identity with your phone number
mcaCard.fillInputs: Please fill in your phone number and select your international prefix
mcaCard.phoneNumberNotValid: Numărul tău de telefon este incorect, te rugăm să pui doar numere
mcaCard.selectMethod: Te rugăm să selectezi metoda de contact dorită pentru a putea verifica identitatea
mcaCard.alertTooManyRequests: Ai solicitat acest serviciu de prea multe ori cu acest număr de telefon. Trebuie să aștepți 24 de ore pentru a încerca din nou sau pentru a schimba numărul de telefon.
mcaCard.alertSomethingHappened: S-a întâmplat ceva. Este din partea noastră, te rugăm să încerci din nou.
mcaCard.alertCodeExpired: Codul a expirat. Te rugăm să ceri altul
mcaCard.refreshAfterAddingWebsiteAddress: Dacă ai adăugat o nouă informație în Google Merchant Center, te rugăm să reîmprospătezi pagina.

mcaRequirements.title: Creeaza un cont nou la Merchant Center
mcaRequirements.legend: Pentru a participa la listele gratuite și pentru a face publicitate pe Google, trebuie să recunoști și să respecți cerințele de mai jos:
mcaRequirements.legend2:
URL-ul site-ului web al magazinului trebuie să fie verificat și revendicat înainte de a putea încărca datele despre produse.  
[Află cum să verifici și să revendici site-ul web](https://support.google.com/merchants/answer/176793?hl=en&ref_topic=3163841)[:target="_blank"].
mcaRequirements.footer: Citește versiunea completă a cerințelor Magazinului Google

accurateContactInformation.title: Confirm că datele mele de contact sunt corecte și valide
accurateContactInformation.description: Comercianții trebuie să aibă cel puțin o metodă de contact listată pe site-ul lor web, care poate fi orice tip de metodă de contact.
accurateContactInformation.link: Descoperă cum să adaugi informații de contact

secureCheckoutProcess.title: Confirm că am o procedură clară de verificare și colectare a datelor
secureCheckoutProcess.description: Nu folosi în mod abuziv informațiile despre utilizator și nici nu le colecta în scopuri neclare sau fără măsuri de securitate adecvate.
secureCheckoutProcess.link: Află despre colectarea și utilizarea iresponsabilă a datelor

returnPolicy.title: Confirm că politica mea de returnare și rambursare este configurată pe site-ul meu
returnPolicy.description: Politica de returnare și rambursare trebuie să fie clară (să includă cerințe și termene) și ușor de accesat pe site-ul tău web.
returnPolicy.link: Află cum să configurezi politicile de returnare

billingTerms.title: Confirm că termenii și condițiile de facturare sunt clare și vizibile
billingTerms.description: Site-ul trebuie să prezinte în mod clar și vizibil opțiunile de plată și toate cheltuielile pe care le va suporta utilizatorul, înainte și după cumpărare.

completeCheckoutProcess.title: Confirm că am un proces de finalizare a comenzii
completeCheckoutProcess.description: Utilizatorii trebuie să poată finaliza cu succes procesul de cumpărare.
completeCheckoutProcess.link: Află mai multe despre cerințele pentru finalizarea comenzii

mcaRequirements.websiteURLDescription: Website-ul folosit pentru a crea contul Merchant Center
mcaRequirements.storeNameDescription: Acest nume va apărea în anunțurile gratuite și în anunțurile de cumpărături.
mcaRequirements.changeCountryField: Poți [change your country]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] informații în back office
mcaRequirements.changeRegionField: Poți [change your country]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] informații în back office
mcaRequirements.changeAddressField: Poți [change your country]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] informații în back office
mcaRequirements.changeZipCodeField: Poți [change your zipcode]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] informații în back office
mcaRequirements.changeCityField: Poți [change your city]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] informații în back office
mcaRequirements.changePhoneNumberField: You can [change your business phone number]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.labelReadAndAgree: By purchasing Shopping ads, I have read and agree to comply with [Google's terms and policies]({0})[:target="_blank"], including [Google’s Merchant Center terms of service]({1})[:target="_blank"], [Shopping ads policies]({2})[:target="_blank"], and [Google Ads Terms and Conditions]({3})[:target="_blank"].
mcaRequirements.alert: Your store will be reviewed so if one of these requirements is missing, your account will be suspended.
mcaRequirements.phoneFormat: Your business phone number isn't a valid format (only accept number) please change it.
mcaRequirements.updateData: If you have made any modification in your backoffice, please refresh your information to see the changes reflected here.

productFeedCard.title: Product feed
productFeedCard.intro: Link your products of your catalog to showcase your products on free listings. Pricing and product availability are automatically updated daily, giving your customers access to the most recent and fairly priced products you have on offer!
productFeedCard.introToConfigure: It's important to submit your product feed in the correct format, as Google uses this to make sure your products match the right queries.
productFeedCard.alertFeedSettingSubmissionSuccess: You have successfully submitted your product data to Merchant Center. Once approved, they will be available for free listings and ads.
productFeedCard.alertFailed: Product sync was not successful. Check possible reasons in [Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"] or contact [customer support](mailto:support-google@prestashop.com).
productFeedCard.alertShippingSettingsMissingDescription: In order to successfully synchronize your product feed, please add shipping information.
productFeedCard.alertProductFeedDeactivated: If the product sync is deactivated, there will be no new products pushed into the GMC. The account itself will continue to exist and the products will expire after 30 days. This stops the catalog items to show on both Free Listings and the ad campaigns.
productFeedCard.alertProductFeedExists:
**A product feed already exists**  
<small>Your product feed already exists. You need to overwrite it to sync your PrestaShop product feed. </small>
productFeedCard.attributeDescription: With these attributes, you can organize your advertising campaigns in Google Ads and override the category automatically assigned by Google in some cases.
productFeedCard.alertGoogleIsReviewingProducts:
Your products are being reviewed  
 It might take 3-5 days to review your products. Once approved, they will be available for free listings and ads.
productFeedCard.alertErrorApi: You can't send your products data to Google right now. Try again later.

steps.shippingSettingsErrors: This country is not compatible with your currency

productFeedSettings.noticeDataStored: Settings are saved at each step, will be submitted only at the final step.
productFeedSettings.submissionExplanation: Please note that data would be stored at each step but would only be submitted at the final step.

shippingSetup.title: Shipping setup
shippingSetup.mandatoryStep: For your products to be shown by Google Merchant Center, shipping is a mandatory step.
shippingSetup.stepExplanation: This can help customers who are browsing your products on Google see your delivery rates and times.

estimateOption.title: I can estimate shipping rates & times
estimateOption.description: You can easily set flat shipping rate and delivery times. You will not be required to import or update your shipping information from Prestashop back office.

importOption.title: I’d like to import my shipping setup from PrestaShop back office
importOption.description: Prestashop will import shipping settings that are already set up in your back office. You can choose which shipping service provider you’d like to use per target country.

validationErrors.needOptionToBeChosen: You need to select one option to continue

tooltips.carrierName: Numele transportatorului te va ajuta să identifici transportatorii atunci când este creat cu metoda de estimare. Acesta este limitat la 90 de caractere
tooltips.freeShippingOverAmount: Introdu valoarea cheltuielilor minime necesare pentru transportul gratuit
tooltips.shippingRate: Introdu tariful de expediere care se aplică sub suma minimă de cheltuire necesară pentru expediere gratuită

deliveryTimeAndRates.title: Timpul de livrare & tarifele
deliveryTimeAndRates.deliveryInfo: Introdu numărul minim și maxim de zile necesare pentru livrare

customRate.title: Alege o rată fixă sau personalizată pentru ţările ţintă
customRate.rateDesc: Pot estima aceeași rată de expediere și timp de livrare pentru toate țările
customRate.customTitle: Tarife personalizate în funcție de țară
customRate.customDesc: Aş dori să stabilesc rate şi timpi diferiti pentru fiecare ţară

storeOffers.flatShippingRateForAllProducts: Tarif fix de transport pentru toate produsele
storeOffers.freeShippingOverAmount: Transport gratuit peste o anumită sumă

shippingRate.rateDesc: Introdu tariful de expediere pentru toate țările țintă

summary.multiCountriesFlatRateForAll: Rata fixă pentru toate țările țintă

validationErrors.missingRateOption: Pentru a continua, trebuie să selectezi o opțiune de rating și să indici tarifele și timpul de livrare în mod corespunzător

validationErrors.needAtLeastOneCarrier: Trebuie să activezi cel puțin un operator pentru a continua
validationErrors.needAtLeastOneCarrierForEachCountry: Pentru a continua, trebuie să activezi și să completezi cel puțin un operator pentru fiecare țară țintă selectată

deliveryTimeAndRates.productAvailaibleIn: Lista dropdown de țări de mai jos se va potrivi cu țările și moneda pe care le-ai configurat în magazinul tău. Poți selecta țările în care dorești ca produsele tale să fie afișate.
deliveryTimeAndRates.ifMultipleCountries: Dacă țintești mai multe țări, fiecare preț de produs va fi convertit automat în moneda corectă în Google. Cu toate acestea, magazinul tău trebuie să aibă livrări și rate de impozitare configurate pentru fiecare țară selectată. Te rugăm să respecți [country specific shopping policies]({0})[:target="_blank"] și [local regulation] ({1})[:target="_blank"]
deliveryTimeAndRates.placeholderSelect: Selectează țările în care produsele tale sunt disponibile
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingSettingsErrors: Această țară nu este compatibilă cu moneda ta
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingDescription1: PrestaShop va importa lista de transportatori din setările magazinului tău și îți va permite să furnizezi informații suplimentare.
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingLabel2: Omite și instalează mai târziu în Google Merchant Center
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingDescription2: Va trebui să introduci informaţii despre transportul produsului tău în Google Merchant Center.
deliveryTimeAndRates.noticeSetupShipping: Your products won’t sync until you setup your products shipping information.
deliveryTimeAndRates.taxSettingsDescription: So that users understand the exact price that they’ll have to pay for a product, you must submit the taxes that you collect. Select how you want to set up tax settings.
deliveryTimeAndRates.manualImportTax: Manually set up tax settings in Google Merchant Center
deliveryTimeAndRates.alertTaxes: You must submit the taxes that you collect, so that users understand the exact price that they’ll have to pay for your products.
deliveryTimeAndRates.shipToCustomerTooltip: Select if this carrier delivers to a customer’s address or not (service point, in store pickup). Google only allows enabling carriers who ship to an address.
deliveryTimeAndRates.handlingTimeTooltip: Enter how long it takes you to prepare an order until it’s picked up by the carrier in working days.
deliveryTimeAndRates.transitTimeTooltip: Enter how long it takes for your order to be shipped to the customer once it leaves your facility.
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingInformationIntro: Rates from enabled carriers will be displayed to customers who are browsing your products on Google.
deliveryTimeAndRates.shippingTableNotice: Google cannot support carrier with pick up in store delivery type, please make sure you disable them or switch to another method.
deliveryTimeAndRates.carriersDropdownHiddenLabel: Copy information of the carrier to other carriers
deliveryTimeAndRates.noCarriersTitle: You don’t have any shipping carriers
deliveryTimeAndRates.noCarriersDescription: Please head to carriers page to add shipping carriers
deliveryTimeAndRates.countryNeededDescription: Please enter target countries to display relevant shipping settings in the table
deliveryTimeAndRates.refreshCarriers: Refresh if you have edited your carriers

preScan.apiError: An error occurred while fetching data, please try again later.
preScan.langConflict: Your product language does not match the target country {0}. Please ensure that the language of your products matches the target country spoken languages, by translating your product or changing the target country. | Your product language does not match the target countries {0}. Please ensure that the language of your products matches the target countries spoken languages, by translating your product or changing the target countries.

export.prohibitedContentNotice: Please review the [prohibited content guidelines]({0})[:target="_blank"] to ensure that products in your feed don’t violate these policies.

attributeMapping.title1: 1. Choose all characteristics that apply to your products
attributeMapping.description1: This will allow you to map mandatory Google product attributes at the next step depending on your catalog.
attributeMapping.title2: 2. Map mandatory Google attributes to your custom fields
attributeMapping.description2: Fill in all values to ensure your products are validated. If a value is missing in your catalog, we recommend you create it and complete the setup later. Keep in mind that Google will favor first filled values.
attributeMapping.apparelAndAccessoriesSubtitle: i.e clothing, bags, shoes or hats
attributeMapping.electronicsTitle: I sell Home and/or Kitchen appliances
attributeMapping.electronicsSubtitle: i.e refrigerators, dishwashers, washing machines, light bulbs
attributeMapping.variantSetsSubtitle: i.e different graphic prints, patterns, fabrics or materials
attributeMapping.learnRequirementsProductSpecification: Learn more about requirements & supported values for the Shopping product data specification
attributeMapping.footerNotice: Describe your product data using attributes. Additionally to required minimum for standard free listings, you can add additional attributes required for enhanced listing. General rule is: the more attributes the better.
attributeMapping.addNewAttributes: Add new attributes in your PrestaShop Catalog
attributeMapping.refreshAttributes: Refresh if you have edited your attributes
attributeMapping.requiredForSomeCategories: This field is required for some product categories. [See more]({0})[:target="_blank" class="external_link-no_icon"]
attributeMapping.learnHowToSetupShippingSettings: Learn how to set up shipping

syncSchedule.title: Synchronization schedule
syncSchedule.subTitle: Choose the time when you want the first synchronization to start, the export might slow down your traffic
syncSchedule.radioLabel1: Now, after I finish my configuration (The export might slow down your shop)
syncSchedule.radioLabel2: Later, appproximatley at 2:00 AM (GMT+1) (When your shop have few visits)

summary.title1: Next synchronization is planned in {0} hours
summary.attributeMapped: One category have been mapped | {0} categories have been mapped
summary.mandatoryAttributesNotMapped: One Google attributes haven't been mapped to your custom fields | {0} Google attributes haven't been mapped to your custom fields.
summary.noticeToCompleteMapping: We recommend mapping all your data otherwise your products might be rejected by Google.
summary.agreementTitle: I understand and agree to the following conditions*
summary.agreementCheckboxLabel1Instant: The synchronization of my product feed will run after I click on save and export (It might take between 1 to 4 hours)
summary.agreementCheckboxLabel1Default: The synchronization of my product feed will take time at {time} (It might take between 1 to 4 hours)
summary.agreementCheckboxLabel2: Google products reviews may take between 3 to 5 business days
summary.disabledButtonTooltip: Check our conditions before moving forward
summary.syncScheduledNow: Today, right after I save and export

freeListingCard.title: Show your products with free listings
freeListingCard.intro: Showcase your product for free in organically-ranked listing on Shopping tab.
freeListingCard.seeFreeListing: See my free listings in Merchant Center
freeListingCard.googleDelay: It takes 3-5 business days to review products
freeListingCard.alertEnableFreeListing: Enable free listings to show your products on Shopping tab for free.
freeListingCard.alertCantEnableFreeListing: You can't enable free listings right now. Try again later.
freeListingCard.alertCountryNotEligible: The target country you have selected is not eligible for free listings and ads.

googleAdsAccountCard.title: Google Ads account
googleAdsAccountCard.intro: Create adverstising campaigns for your products: find the right audience at the right time.
googleAdsAccountCard.text: Once connected you may need to configure your billing settings in your Google Ads account.
googleAdsAccountCard.labelSelect: You can connect an existing Google Ads account, or create a new one in a few easy steps.
googleAdsAccountCard.toUseGAdsNeedsAdminAccess: To use an existing Google Ads account, you must have Admin access.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertCantConnect: Could not connect your Google Ads account, it's on our side, please give it another try.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertBillingSettingsMissing: To launch Performance Max campaigns, you need to add your billing settings in your Google Ads account.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedRefreshAfterBilling: Once filled in your billing info in your Google Ads account, refresh the page to view updates.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedRefreshAfterInvitationLink: Once the invitation is accepted in your Google Ads account, refresh the page to view updates.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedValidationFromEmail: Please click here or check your emails to validate your account.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertSuspended: You need to resolve issues in your Google Ads account.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertCancelled: You need to reactivate your account in your Google Ads account.

email.title: Your Google email address
email.description: The email address below is the one provided during your Google account connection

business.name: Business name
business.title: Business information

terms.title: Terms of service for Google Program
terms.label: I have read and agree with [Google Ads terms and conditions]({0})[:target="_blank" class="ps_gs-fz-12 text-muted"]

smartShoppingCampaignCard.title: Boost your sales with Performance Max Campaigns
smartShoppingCampaignCard.introNotConnected: Connect or create your Google Ads account and launch a Performance Max campaign for your products. Maximize your campaign performance across multiple Google channels through one single campaign. Show your ads where they have higher chances of driving conversion. Even better, you don't pay unless your customers click.
smartShoppingCampaignCard.introConnected: With Performance Max, you can advertise your products and maximize your ads performance across multiple Google channels through one single campaign. Even better, you don’t pay unless your customers click!
smartShoppingCampaignCard.footer: In the European Economic Area, the United Kingdom or Switzerland, Performance Max campaigns can be used with any Comparison Shopping Service (CSS) you work with. The ads will show on general search results pages and on any other surfaces the CSS has opted in to.
smartShoppingCampaignCard.contentInfo: Advertisers who upgrade Smart Shopping campaigns to Performance Max see an average increase of 12% in conversion value at the same or better return on ad spend (ROAS)*

smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputNameHelper: The name must be unique and 125 chars max.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputNameTooltip: Choose a name that clearly describes the theme of the campaign so that you can easily find it in your account. Your campaign name isn't visible to your customers.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCampaignNameTooLongFeedback: The name must be less than 125 characters in length.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDurationHelper: We recommend a minimum duration of 30 days so that Google can optimize your campaign.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDurationTooltip: Ad campaigns have no end date by default, so that the ads are able to run indefinitely. You can always add an end date to create a shorter campaign.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDurationInvalidFeedback: The end date must be set in the future.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDatePickerHelper: Use cursor keys to navigate calendar dates
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryHelper: To target multiple countries you have to create multiple campaigns.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryImutable: Country can't be changed after creation, if you want to target a different country, you'll need to create a new campaign
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryTooltip: Your campaign’s ads are eligible to show to customers in your targeted geographic locations, or to customers who have selected your targeted language as their browser’s language setting.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputFiltersPartialLabel: Select products using product partition filters
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputFiltersHelper: Take some time to [read Google Shopping ads policies]({0})[:target="_blank"] some product are prohibited or restricted.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetHelper: You will only pay if someone clicks your ad.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetInvalidFeedback: Your daily budget must be a valid number greater than 1. For any decimal number, please use a dot as separator.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetTooltip: Your budget is the average amount you’re comfortable spending each day on your campaign. The budget you choose is entirely up to you, and you can adjust it at any time.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.formHelperDescription: Your campaign will run until you pause it or as soon as end date is meet. You can pause it at any time.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.errorNoProducts: You want to launch a campaign, but your Google merchant center does not contain any products yet. Your campaign will start only when at least one product has been approved by Google.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.errorApi: We were not able to publish your campaign, please try again
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.errorFetchingFilters: We were not able to retrieve all filters from Google. You can't modify them for now.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.recapNoFiltersDescription: All synced products approved by Google
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.recapFooter: Check the information of your campaign before validating it. You can always modify some parameters while the campaign is in progress.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleCreationRemarketingTag: Enable remarketing  tags on my site
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleCreationNewRemarketingTag: Create a new remarketing and conversion tracking tag to your shop
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.enableCreationRemarketingTag: Enable remarketing and conversion tracking tag
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.pauseCampaign: Your campaign will run until you pause it or as soon as end date is meet. You can pause it at any time.

alerts.noTag: By not adding the tag automatically Google will not be able to send campaigns results
alerts.duplicatedTag: Looks like you already have a tag linked to your google account, creating a new tag can duplicates events for your campaigns. We suggest to only keep the one we generate for you.
alerts.noConversionActions: The tracking tag has been enabled, but there is no conversion action set on the shop. This can be fixed by creating new ones.
alerts.hasUnhandledFilters: At least one filter of this campaign is not supported by this module. To prevent any loss on your existing configuration, only basic details of the campaign can be modified.
alerts.PMaxExplanationTitle: Performance Max is a new goal-based campaign.
alerts.PMaxExplanation: Performance Max is an enhanced campaign type powered by Google's smart technology. It can help you optimize your ads across multiple Google channels and drive better results for your business.
alerts.PMaxExplanationPrecision: Even better, you won't pay unless customers click.
alerts.PMaxExplanationLink: Find out more about Performance Max

smartShoppingCampaignCreation.nbDimensionSelected: No dimension selected | {0} dimension selected | {0} dimensions selected
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.nbValuesSelected: No value selected | {0} value selected | {0} values selected
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.selectProductsSubtitle: The campaign can only have one dimension with one or multiple values.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.remarketingNote: **Please note:** if you already have Google Ads Conversion Actions with transaction-specific conversion values configured on your site for this Google Ads account, then you do not need to set new conversion tags on your site.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleNewConversionTag: Set new conversion tracking tags on my site
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleNewConversionTag2: We will create the following conversion tags : Page view, Purchase, Add to basket
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.remarketingTagLoading: Checking if you have a remarketing and conversion tracking tags to add to your shop
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.descriptiveMessage:
Only the Performance Max campaigns and Smart Shopping campaigns associated to your Google Merchant Center account are listed. 
If you want to see all your campaigns, [please go to your Google Ads Account]({0})[:target="_blank"].
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.nbProductsFiltersSelected: No product filter selected | {0} product filter selected | {0} products filters selected
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.categoriesSubTitle: Google-defined product category for your product (ex: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Coats & Jackets)
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.conditionsSubTitle: The condition of your product at time of sale (ex: New, used or refurbished)
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.filtersWithxValues: {0} filters | {0} filters with {1} affected product | {0} filters with {1} affected products

budgetTip.content: It is generally recommended to start with a **minimum budget of {0} per day for your daily ad spend**. This allows you to reach a larger audience & potentially see better results.
budgetTip.readMore:
This recommended minimum budget will allow you to test the effectiveness
  of your ads and make adjustments as needed. Of course, every business is
  different, and the actual budget that is best for you may vary depending
  on your specific goals and target audience. We recommend experimenting
  with different budgets to determine what works best for your business.

alert.googleIsReviewing:
Your products are being reviewed.  
 It might take 3-5 days to review your products. Once approved, your products will be available for free listings and ads.
alert.alertSuccess: You are successfully opted in. Once your products are approved, they can appear in Google Shopping tab search results.

syncStatus.title: Synchronization status
syncStatus.readyForExport: Product feed is ready for export
syncStatus.alert: Product sync was not successful. Check possible reasons in [Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"] or contact [customer support](mailto:support-google@prestashop.com).

subtitle.error: Due to a technical issue, the sync failed on {0} at {1}. A new one will run in a few hours.

productStatus.title: Products status
productStatus.description:
The status of your product lets you know if your product is eligible to appear in the destination you’ve opted into.  
A pending product won't show in ads or free listings because it's being reviewed by Google.  
Expiring products will expire in the next 3 days, and will no longer be eligible to appear in ads or free listings.
productStatus.alert: It takes 3-5 business days to review products
productStatus.approvedProductsDescription: Active products are fully approved and eligible to appear in results.
productStatus.pendingProductsDescription: A pending product won't show in ads or free listings because it's being reviewed by Google.
productStatus.expiringProductsDescription: Expiring products will be removed from your Google merchant center in the next 3 days, and will no longer be eligible to appear in ads or free listings.
productStatus.disapprovedProductsDescription: Your product is disapproved for a destination and isn't active.

overview.title: Active products submitted to Google
overview.description: The status of your product lets you know if your product is eligible to appear in the destination you’ve opted into.

alert.prescanTitle: Warning {0} product couldn’t be exported to Google | Warning {0} products couldn’t be exported to Google
alert.prescanDescription: Some of your products didn’t pass our verification, make sure that your products have the required information to be listed on Google Shopping.

preScan.description: {0} with problems that couldn't be synced are listed below.
preScan.labelTooltipDescription: This attribute matches what you have configured in your product attribute mapping : short description, description...
preScan.labelTooltipBarcode: This attribute matches what you have configured in your product attribute mapping : barcode, MPN, GTIN, ISBN, UPC...

approvalTable.description: These are the status of your products that are sent to Google Merchant Center. Some products might appear more than once because of their language variation.

errorReason.incorrectInfos: Typos and other missing or incorrect information

syncTimeline.subtitle1: Now or later, depends on your sync settings

campaignCard.title: Create your Performance Max campaign in a few clicks
campaignCard.description:
Google A.I. will display ads of the searched products to interested shoppers at the right time increasing your sales.

Set a daily budget and easily launch your ads campaign - you only get billed when the ads are clicked, it's that easy!
campaignCard.footer: We'll need to activate remarketing and conversion tracking tag for you to run Peformance Max campaigns

keymetrics.title: Key metrics
keymetrics.impressionsTooltip: Count of how often your ad has appeared on a search results page or website on the Google Network.
keymetrics.clicksTooltip: When someone clicks your ad, like on the blue headline or phone number of a text ad, Google Ads counts that as a click.
keymetrics.conversionsTooltip: The number of conversions. This only includes conversion actions which include_in_conversions_metric attribute is set to true. If you use conversion-based bidding, your bid strategies will optimize for these conversions.
keymetrics.averageCostPerClickTooltip: The total cost of all clicks divided by the total number of clicks received.
keymetrics.costsTooltip: The sum of your cost-per-click (CPC) and cost-per-thousand impressions (CPM) costs during this period.
keymetrics.salesTooltip: The value of conversions. This only includes conversion actions which include_in_conversions_metric attribute is set to true. If you use conversion-based bidding, your bid strategies will optimize for these conversions.

tooltipCol.status: A status for your ad campaign that describes whether or not its ads can run at the moment.
tooltipCol.products: Product filter is what you selected as your campaign filter with the number of affected products.

help.intro: PrestaShop Marketing makes it easy to connect your store with Google and promote your products to millions of shoppers across multiple Google channels. Create Performance Max campaigns without leaving your PrestaShop dashboard and drive more traffic.

allowsYouTo.title: This module allows you to:
allowsYouTo.easySync: Easily sync your product catalog with Google to keep product details such as price and availability automatically updated
allowsYouTo.freeListing: Enable free listings and broaden your reach by showing your products to shoppers browsing on the Shopping tab, for free
allowsYouTo.campaigns: Get started with Performance Max campaigns, set a daily budget and let Google’s machine learning optimize your campaigns
allowsYouTo.reporting: Analyze your campaign performance without leaving PrestaShop

help.needHelp: Need help? Find here the documentation of this module.
help.couldntFindAnyAnswer: Couldn"t find any answer to your question?

glass.message:
Can't see Google secured browser?  
Hit Continue to relaunch the window and finish configuration.

You may need to activate popups in your browser to continue.

badge.creatingGmc: Creating account in a few seconds...
badge.pendingCheck: We are checking your GMC status...

modal.textDisconnectGoogleAccount: You are about to disconnect Google account. This will remove access to Google, Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts.
modal.textDisconnectMCA: Disconnecting your Merchant Center will remove access to your Google Ads in this module and pause any running campaign.
modal.textoverwrite:
Overwriting existing claim will deactivate your previous account and pause existing campaigns tied to that account- free listings and Shopping campaigns.  
If you are running a different Shopping campaign, we recommend pausing it.
modal.textDisableFreeListing:
By disabling free listings your products will no longer be available for organic listing on Shopping tab.  
 However your product feed will stay available.
modal.textEnableFreeListing: This action will also cause the reactivation of the product feed.
modal.textCancelProductFeed: You will lose all unsaved changes if you Continue. To successully submit your product data to Google, you need to complete all steps.
modal.textOverwriteProductFeed: Overwriting your existing product feed will delete it. You will need to configure new product feed.
modal.textDisconnectGoogleAds: Disconnecting from your Google Ads account will remove the ability to run Performance Max campaigns from the module.
modal.pauseCampaignsExplainations: By pausing all your campaigns, the billing will stop. You can restart your campaigns at any time in your Google ads account.
modal.removeTag: Remove “Remarketing and conversion” tag from my shop
modal.removeTagExplainations: Removing the tag means that Google will no longer be able to track your campaigns. We recommend that you only remove the tag if you plan to completely remove the module or change your account. You can always add it yourself in the code of your site.
modal.titleActivateTrackingSSC: Activate remarketing and conversion tracking tag.
modal.textActivateTrackingSSC:
In order to run Performance Max campaigns, Google Ads needs to be able to create [remarketing list]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] and [conversion tracking tag]({1})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] on your site.   
 PrestaShop will automatically set these code snippets on your shop.
modal.textConfirmCancel: If you go back you will lose your selected values
modal.upgradeSCCToPmaxTextWithoutCampaign:
Starting {0}, you will be able to create Performance Max campaigns for your store. 

 Performance Max is the next generation of Smart Shopping campaigns. It is an enhanced campaign type powered by Google's smart technology. It works behind the scene to automatically optimise your ads across the shopping journey to drive maximum performance.
modal.PMaxLiveText:
Starting today, you can create Performance Max campaigns, the next generation of Smart Shopping. 

Performance Max is an enhanced campaign type powered by Google's smart technology. It works behind the scenes to automatically optimize your ads across the shopping journey to drive maximum performance.
modal.PMaxMigrationText:
Your Smart Shopping campaigns will start automatically upgrading to Performance Max campaigns now.

- Your campaign settings and budget remain the same. 

- The functionality is at parity to Smart Shopping campaigns. 

- From this point on you can only create Performance Max campaigns.
modal.textPmaxReleased: Your Smart Shopping campaigns will start automatically upgrading to Performance Max Campaigns now. [Learn more]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"]

attributeMapping.description: The description will be cropped automatically if it is longer than 5000
attributeMapping.ageGroup: The demographic for which your product is targeted.
attributeMapping.gtin: A code printed on product packaging to aid in identify a particular item.
attributeMapping.mpn: A unique number that is issued by manufacturers to identify individual products. It is a series of numbers and letters.
attributeMapping.pattern: Your product's pattern or graphic print

banner.titleAdsbanner: Just starting out in Google advertising?
banner.textAdsBannerLong: Get {0} of Google Ads credits* when you spend at least {0} to create your first campaigns on PrestaShop or directly via your [Google Ads Account]({1})[:target=\"_blank\"].
banner.textAdsBanner: Get {0} of Google Ads credits* when you spend at least {0} to create your first campaigns.
banner.legendLong: *Your voucher will be applied automatically from the moment you start spending! *The amount needs to be spent within 60 days of the first campaign spend and credits will be valid for 60 days once credited. [Read T&C]({0})[:target=\"_blank\"]
banner.legend: *Create a new Google Ads account, the voucher will be applied automatically once you match the spend and you will have 60 days to spend the credits. [Read T&C]({0})[:target=\"_blank\"]
banner.legendWithoutTC: * Create a new Google Ads account, the voucher will be applied automatically once you match the spend and you will have 60 days to spend the credits.
banner.textCampaignsBanner: Performance Max is the next generation of Smart Shopping campaigns. It is an enhanced campaign type powered by Google's smart technology. It works behind the scene to automatically optimise your ads across the shopping journey to drive maximum performance.
